name: Ocala Land and Realty
desc: Fully functioning website provided to realtor Jorge Sousa. Displays all of his listings and prompts clients to reach out and connect with Jorge.

name: Accurate Pest Solutions
desc: Website for Accurate Pest Solutions. Created as a replacement to an unnattractive rental website, this website is hosted and maintained by me, and allows potential customers to ask questions and connect with Accurate Pest Solutions.

name: Twitter Bot
desc: Bot designed to display the latest tweet from a chosen individual. This was originally done to stay up to date on exclusive product news.

name: Navi Bot
desc: Discord bot designed to message 1 person at random on a discord server `Hey! Listen!` every hour. Works with any number of discord servers. Designed to be a funny side project, it gives me a laugh every time I get a notification and I see that the bot is working great. Is up and running and you can add this bot to your server here:
